CustomField.formula: IF( Contains(Email, "gmail")|| Contains(Email, "yahoo")|| Contains (Email, "hotmail")|| Contains (Email, "aol") || Contains (Email, "comcast") || Contains (Email, "bellsouth") || Contains (Email, "verizon") || Contains (Email, "msn") || Contains (Email, "rollins") || Contains (Email, "att") || Contains (Email, "cox") || Contains (Email, "scbglobal") || Contains (Email, "earthlink") || Contains (Email, "icloud") || Contains (Email, "optonline") || Contains (Email, "ymail") || Contains (Email, "charter") || Contains (Email, "outlook"), NULL, SUBSTITUTE(Email, LEFT(Email,FIND("@",Email)),NULL) )
CustomField.label: Email Domain
